privacy.title: Privacy Policy
privacy.intro: At Poolr, we take your privacy seriously. This Privacy Policy explains how we collect, use, disclose, and safeguard your information when you use our ridesharing platform. NOTE: This application is a university proof-of-concept. No real services are provided.
privacy.infoCollectDesc: We collect information that you provide directly to us, including:
privacy.infoCollectItem2: Driver verification status (we do NOT store your actual license documents)
privacy.infoCollectItem3: Location data for ride matching and navigation
privacy.infoCollectItem4: Payment information processed securely through PayPal
privacy.howWeUseDesc: We use the information we collect to:
privacy.howWeUseItem1: Facilitate ridesharing connections between drivers and riders
privacy.howWeUseItem4: Improve our services and user experience
privacy.dataSharingDesc: We share your information only with other users as necessary to facilitate rides (such as sharing your pickup location with your driver), with service providers who assist our operations, and when required by law.
privacy.yourRightsItem1: Access and update your personal information
privacy.yourRightsItem2: Request deletion of your account and data
privacy.securityDesc: We implement appropriate technical and organizational measures to protect your personal information against unauthorized access, alteration, disclosure, or destruction.

terms.title: Terms of Service
terms.intro: Welcome to Poolr. By accessing or using our ridesharing platform, you agree to be bound by these Terms of Service. Please read them carefully. NOTE: This application is a university proof-of-concept.
terms.acceptanceDesc: By creating an account or using Poolr, you acknowledge that you have read, understood, and agree to be bound by these Terms of Service and our Privacy Policy.
terms.useOfServiceDesc: Poolr provides a platform connecting drivers with riders for shared transportation. By using our service, you agree to:
terms.useOfServiceItem2: Maintain the security of your account
terms.useOfServiceItem3: Use the service in compliance with all applicable laws
terms.useOfServiceItem4: Treat other users with respect and courtesy
terms.userResponsibilitiesItem1: Arriving on time at designated pickup locations
terms.userResponsibilitiesItem2: Communicating clearly with drivers or riders
terms.driverRequirementsItem3: Keep their vehicle in safe operating condition
terms.paymentDesc: All payments are processed securely through PayPal. Riders agree to pay the fare displayed before booking, and drivers agree to the platform's fee structure.
terms.liabilityDesc: Poolr acts as a platform to connect users and is not responsible for the actions of drivers or riders. We are not liable for any damages arising from the use of our service.
terms.changesDesc: We reserve the right to modify these Terms of Service at any time. Continued use of the platform after changes constitutes acceptance of the new terms.

prof.title: My Profile

prof.completeVehicleSetupMessage: Complete your vehicle setup to start offering rides.
prof.update_error: An error occurred while updating your profile.

heroSubtitle: Poolr connects you with neighbors for seamless ridesharing. Save costs, reduce traffic, and meet great people.
driverDescription: Turn your empty seats into savings. Help your community, reduce traffic, and cover your commute costs by driving with Poolr.
